title: Prehistoric Anivia makes no sense

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Prehistoric Anivia with ingame gameplay! Price: 750RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as Prehistoric Anivia, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
She's a Pterodactyl that has Ice abilities.
Dinosaurs died because of the Ice Age.
Anivia killed/kills all her dino friends. (Dinohunter Anivia)


The abilities should be.
Q:
A flying boulder with mud/dirt.

W: 
A wall made of mud/dirt or
A thick tree "falls" out of the sky slowly crumbling and cracking.

E: 
A snapped part of a tree like a branch.

R:
Swirling wind with mud/dirt and leaves.

replies.body:
Following this trend,

Her next skin shall be "Scaleless Anivia".

If you catch my drift.
It's only a 750 skin if it had all of that it would be at least 1350 I imagine.

> [{quoted}](name=Oprah Windfurry,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rJNwGdgP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-28T09:11:30.787+0000)
>
> It's only a 750 skin if it had all of that it would be at least 1350 I imagine.

I realise that. Riot can be persuaded to bump up the cost and quality when enough people truly push, and when it doesn't breach their set boundary "theme" for a skin/champion.

While i agree that your idea would be much much better, and i would buy it instantly if it did what you say 

but the point you make is irrelevant because birds dont shoot ice either and she is normally a bird
so if a bird can then a Pterodactyl or Archopteryx could too, and if they died by ice, (when birds didnt) they have have a bigger connection to it than birds, so shooting ice would be even more suited to dinosaurs than birds.
She is a "dinophoenix", a magic dino birdy who summons up prehistoric mud. simple explanations for simple minded people
The wall should be bones with skulls at the base!! I was disappointed too
